META_DESCRIPTION: Firmware update & recovery tool for OneKey hardware wallets.
TR_RES_REPAIR: For {0} device, if there are problems such as picture display, you can click the link below to view the repair document
TR_CLICK_TO_BOARD: Click to enter the board mode
TR_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_1: Please first upgrade your OneKey Touch firmware to {version} or above
TR_LIST_TIP_1: Please unlock the device and keep it on the home page of the device, click the start button to operate, do not operate the device during the process
TR_LIST_TIP_2: Repairing resources lasts about 5 minutes, please make sure that the USB cable and the current window are normal
TR_LIST_TIP_3: Failed to repair resources may cause device icons to display abnormally and will not affect your asset status
TR_LIST_TIP_4: Before the operation, it is recommended to exit the OneKey Wallet desktop client and other software to prevent the update failure due to the communication conflict with the device
TR_LIST_TIP_5: Before the operation, you need to confirm twice on the device, please pay close attention to the on-screen prompts, the image processing status will be displayed at the bottom of the device during the update process
TR_RESTART_HOME: The device is currently in the update mode, please restart the device manually and enter the device home page
TR_BACKUP_FINISHED_TEXT: Backup is now on your recovery seed card. Once again dont lose it and keep it private!
TR_BACKUP_INSTRUCTION: Now your device is going to show you 24 words to backup your wallet. Write them down. Do not disconnect your device.
TR_BACKUP_SUBHEADING_1: Your recovery seed is the backup key to all your cryptocurrencies and applications.
TR_BACKUP_SUBHEADING_2: Your recovery seed can only be displayed once. Never make a digital copy of your recovery seed and never upload it online. Keep your recovery seed in a safe place.
TR_BLUETOOTH_FIRMWARE_DESCRIPTION: Manages Bluetooth communication and provides wireless connectivity
TR_BOOTLOADER_DESCRIPTION: Responsible for system startup and updates, enabling firmware upgrades
TR_FIRMWARE_DESCRIPTION: Main operating system of the device, providing core functionality and security features
TR_BOOKMARK_SUBHEADING: Protect yourself against {TR_PHISHING_ATTACKS}. Bookmark OneKey Wallet (onekey.so) to avoid visiting fake sites.
TR_BRIDGE_IS_RUNNING: Onekey Bridge is up and running
TR_BRIDGE_SUBHEADING: Onekey Bridge is a communication tool to facilitate the connection between your OneKey and your internet browser.
TR_CHECK_BRIDGE: Check Onekey Bridge is installed and running correctly.
TR_CONNECTED_DEVICE_IS_IN_BOOTLOADER: Connected device is in bootloader mode. Reconnect it to continue.
TR_DEVICE_DISCONNECTED_DURING_ACTION_DES: You device disconnected during action which resulted in interuption of backup process. For security reasons you need to wipe your device now and start the backup process again.
TR_DEVICE_ERROR_BATCH: Your device is a problem and cannot be upgraded.
TR_DEVICE_IN_BOOTLOADER_MODE_INSTRUCTION: Device is connected in bootloader mode. Plug out the USB cable and connect device again.
TR_DEVICE_IS_USED_IN_OTHER_WINDOW_HEADIN: Device is used in other window
TR_DEVICE_IS_USED_IN_OTHER_WINDOW_TEXT: This is a big no no. Please dont use device in other window. Close all other windows or tabs that might be using your OneKey device.
TR_DEVICE_YOU_RECONNECTED_IS_DIFFERENT: Device you reconnected is different from the previous device. Connect the right one or refresh your internet browser and start again.
TR_DID_YOU_PURCHASE: Did you purchase your device from {TR_RESELLERS_LINK}? If no, device you are holding in hands might be a counterfeit. Please {TR_CONTACT_OUR_SUPPORT_LINK}
TR_DOUBLE_CLICK_IT_TO_RUN_INSTALLER: Double click it to run installer
TR_DO_NOT_SAFE_IN_COMPUTER_INSTRUCTION: Do not write it into a computer
TR_DO_NOT_TAKE_PHOTO_INSTRUCTION: Do not take a photo of your recovery seed
TR_DO_NOT_UPLOAD_INSTRUCTION: Do not upload words on the internet
TR_EMAIL_SKIPPED: You chose not to provide your email. This is Ok. If you want, you might still follow us on socials:
TR_ENTER_PIN_TEXT: Your device gets locked anytime you disconnect it. You now need to enter your PIN to continue.
TR_ENTER_SEED_WORDS_INSTRUCTION: Enter words from your seed in order displayed on your device.
TR_ERROR_BEFORE_INSTALL: There may be issues with installing firmware from local files. Always make sure you are installing firmware from a trusted source.
TR_FINAL_SUBHEADING: Now you are ready to enjoy bleeding edge security with OneKey.
TR_SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_COMPONENT: Please select at least one component (firmware, bluetooth firmware or bootloader) for installation
TR_FIRMWARE_INSTALLED: Perfect. The newest firmware is installed. Time to continue
TR_FIRMWARE_INSTALLED_TEXT: This device has already installed firmware version: {version}
TR_FIRMWARE_INSTALL_RESTART: and the power button, release the power button after restarting
TR_FIRMWARE_INSTALL_SHOW_BOOTLOADER: At this time, the device displays the word Bootloader
TR_FIRMWARE_INSTALL_TIPS_TITLE: Please follow the steps below to start the firmware installation
TR_FIRMWARE_SUBHEADING: Your OneKey is shipped without firmware installed to ensure that you can get started with the latest features right away. The authenticity of the installed firmware is always checked during device start. If the firmware is not correctly signed by SatoshiLabs, your OneKey will display a warning.
TR_FIRMWARE_USER_ENSURE: I confirm that the device is empty or I already have a recovery seed.
TR_FIRST_PIN_ENTERED: Good. You entered a new pin. But to make sure you did not make mistake, please enter it again. Look at your device now, numbers are now different.
TR_FOUND_OK_DEVICE: Found an empty device, yay! You can continue now.
TR_HOLOGRAM_STEP_SUBHEADING: Please make sure hologram protecting your device is authentic
TR_INIT: Initializing, please wait (please make sure the device has exited sleep mode)
TR_INSTRUCTION_TO_SKIP_OR_WIPE: You might skip setup and continue to wallet or wipe your device to be able to go through the onboarding process again.
TR_I_HAVE_READ_INSTRUCTIONS: I have read the instructions and agree
TR_MAKE_SURE_IT_IS_WELL_CONNECTED: Make sure your device is well connected to avoid communication failures.
TR_MINI_FIRMWARE_INSTALL_TIPS_2: While holding down the right physical button of OneKey MINI, reinsert the USB cable connection.
TR_MINI_FIRMWARE_INSTALL_TIPS_3: The device will display the word bootloader, and then just release the right physical button.
TR_NAME_CHANGED_TEXT: Excellent, your device has a custom name now. It will be visible on your device display from now on.
TR_NAME_ONLY_ASCII: Name can contain only basic letters
TR_NAME_SUBHEADING: Personalize your device with your own name.
TR_NEWSLETTER_SUBHEADING: Receive information on important security updates
TR_PIN_ENTERING_DESCRIPTION: In order to secure maximum security, we do not display pin on your computer. We will just show a blind matrix, real layout is displayed on your device.
TR_PIN_ERROR_TROUBLESHOOT: Are you confused, how PIN works? You can always refer to our {TR_DOCUMENTATION}
TR_PIN_SET_SUCCESS: Purfect! Your device is now secured by pin.
TR_PIN_SUBHEADING: Protect device from unauthorized access by using a strong pin.
TR_RANDOM_SEED_WORDS_DISCLAIMER: Please note, that to maximaze security, your device will ask you to enter {count} fake words that are not part of your seed.
TR_RECONNECT_INSTRUCTION: Reconnect your device and wait for a while
TR_RECONNECT_TEXT: We lost connection with your device. This might mean:
TR_RECONNECT_TROUBLESHOOT_BRIDGE: Onekey Bridge might have stopped working, try restarting
TR_RECONNECT_TROUBLESHOOT_CABEL: Cable is broken, try another one
TR_RECONNECT_TROUBLESHOOT_CONNECTION: Device is not well connected to the cable
TR_RECOVERY_SUCCESS: Excellent, you recovered device from seed.
TR_RECOVERY_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Both methods are safe. Basic recovery uses on computer input of words in randomized order. Advanced recovery uses on-screen input to load your recovery seed. {TR_LEARN_MORE_LINK}
TR_RECOVER_SUBHEADING: It is possible to re-create device from bip39 backup. First of all, chose number of words of your backup.
TR_RECOVER_SUBHEADING_MODEL_T: On model T the entire recovery process is doable on device.
TR_SATOSHILABS_CANNOT_BE_HELD_RESPONSIBL: SatoshiLabs cannot be held responsible for security liabilities or financial losses resulting from not following security instructions described here.
TR_SEARCHING_TAKES_TOO_LONG: Searching for your device takes too long, you might want to try to:
TR_SECURITY_SUBHEADING: Good job, your wallet is ready. But we strongly recommend you to spend few more minutes and improve your security.
TR_SEED_IS_MORE_IMPORTANT_THAN_YOUR_DEVI: Seed is more important than your device
TR_THANK_YOU_FOR_EMAIL: Thank you for providing your email. You can also follow us on socials:
TR_ONEKEY_ETHEREUM_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: New wallet with support of Ethereum and Ripple
TR_ONEKEY_PASSWORD_MANAGER_DESCRIPTION: A safe way how to manage your credentials with OneKey.
TR_ONEKEY_STABLE_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: Web wallet with support of Bitcoin, Dash, Zcash and other coins.
TR_USER_HAS_NOT_WORKDED_WITH_THIS_DEVICE: It is a brand new device, just unpacked
TR_USER_HAS_NOT_WORKED_WITH_THIS_DEVICE_: In that case you should immediately contact Onekey support with detailed information on your purchase and refrain from using this device.
TR_USER_HAS_WORKDED_WITH_THE_DEVICE: I have worked with it before
TR_WAIT_FOR_REBOOT: Wait for your device to reboot
TR_WARNING_BEFORE_INSTALL: Please ensure your device is charged before installing firmware. If your device shuts down during the installation, it may be bricked.
TR_WIPE_WARNING: Danger zone here, wiping device erases all data and can not be reverted
TR_WRITE_DOWN_NTH_WORD: Write down {NthWord} from your device to your recovery seed card.
TR_GO_TO_BOOTLOADER: Please confirm and enter bootloader mode
TR_USE_DESKTOP_CLIENT_TO_INSTALL: Please use the OneKey desktop client to update
TR_ONEKEY_BRIDGE_STR_IS_NOW_AVAILABLE_DO: OneKey Bridge {0} is now available, Do you want to download?
TR_LOCAL_FIRMWARE_DESCRIPTION: Select local firmware files for update. Ensure files are from a trusted source.
